alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe in Maui (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 31 at 12:18PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM HST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE ISLAND OF MOLOKAI IN MAUI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Molokai in Maui County. * WHEN...Until 315 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1215 PM HST, radar indicated heavy rain falling at a rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour over and around Kaunakakai and Hoolehua. Additional heavy rainfall will move over the entire island from the south this afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... the entire island of Molokai. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 315 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
